issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Similar to YARN-6708 during public localization also we have to take care for parent directory if the umask is 027 during node manager start up.

<localdir>/filecache/0/200

the directory permission of <localdir>/filecache/0 is 750. Which cause application failure
fields.summary: Parent directory permission incorrect during public localization

comments.body: Thanks [~bibinchundatt] for reporting the issue. I have attached a patch. Please review.

Thank you [~BilwaST] for patch.

Sorry for delay . Overall patch looks good to me. Uploading rebased patch .
